|elevation_ft = |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = 026 |blank_name = |blank_info = |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |website = |footnotes = }} Karaj (Persian: کرج) is an Iranian city and main city of Alborz province. The city has about 1,370,000 inhabitants. Karaj is the 6th largest city in Iran. ==Related pages== * List of cities in Iran == Other websites == *Karaj city portal *About Karaj city *Karaj, Iran, Yahoo!
